statements: SELECT * FROM user_authentication;
SELECT user_id, username, access_level FROM user_authentication;
SELECT username, password FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, access_level FROM user_authentication WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE access_level = 'user' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE access_level = 'admin' OR access_level = 'super_admin';
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username='admin'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(access_id) AS access_count FROM users LEFT JOIN access_control ON users.user_id = access_control.user_id GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE permission_level > 2 ORDER BY device_id ASC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, created_at FROM users WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 WEEK;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM access_control GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT username, permission_level FROM users JOIN access_control ON users.user_id = access_control.user_id WHERE permission_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_model FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, device_id, access_level FROM access_control WHERE access_level > 1;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_model LIKE '%-X%';
SELECT users.username, devices.device_name FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.device_id;
SELECT devices.device_name, users.username FROM devices JOIN users ON devices.device_id = users.user_id;

SELECT users.username, devices.device_name, access_control.access_level FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.device_id JOIN access_control ON users.user_id = access_control.user_id WHERE access_control.access_level > 1;

SELECT users.username, devices.device_name, access_control.access_level FROM devices JOIN users ON devices.device_id = users.user_id JOIN access_control ON devices.device_id = access_control.device_id WHERE devices.device_name LIKE '%A%';

SELECT devices.device_name, access_control.access_level, users.username FROM devices JOIN access_control ON devices.device_id = access_control.device_id JOIN users ON access_control.user_id = users.user_id WHERE users.username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_role_mapping WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_role_mapping urm ON u.user_id = urm.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON urm.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY user_id DESC;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_role_mapping urm ON u.user_id = urm.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON urm.role_id = r.role_id JOIN user_permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, user_id FROM devices WHERE device_name LIKE '%phone%';
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id WHERE devices.device_name = 'Phone';

SELECT users.username, permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id JOIN permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT device_name, users.username FROM devices JOIN users ON devices.user_id = users.user_id WHERE users.role = 'User' ORDER BY device_name DESC;

SELECT users.username, COUNT(devices.device_id) AS device_count FROM users LEFT JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id GROUP BY users.username HAVING device_count > 1 ORDER BY device_count DESC;
